participant_1.name: Michael
participant_1.personality: Wise and reflective, with a strong sense of faith.
participant_1.background: I am married. I have a passion for god. I love to travel. My favorite book is the bible. I am a older gentlemen.

participant_2.name: Jessica
participant_2.personality: Energetic and nurturing, with a love for animals and culinary arts.
participant_2.background: I am in my last year of grad school. I am the worlds best aunt. I am obsessed with my dog. I enjoy cooking italian food. I love trips to the beach.
